item.title: Assignment 1 - Network Analysis
item.description: Introduction In th first Part 2, you will replicate a well known network analysis, with different data and some twists. Data: The data is to be found at: https://github.com/SDS-AAU/SDS-master/tree/master/00_data/network_krackhard (Hint: You neet to download the raw data) Data: What do I get? Background Let the fun begin. You will analyze network datacollected from the managers of a high-tec company. This dataset, originating from the paper below, is widely used in research on organizational networks.
